physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a street that is flanked with shophouses on both sides. Clothes such as tee shirts, shorts, and trousers protrude from both levels of these shophouses, from the sticks in which they are hung from. A couple of rickshaws and a car can be seen on the street.
title_text: Rows of shophouses Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: street scenes residential structures mercantile buildings
